mapper.select: select * from t_order where member_id=#{member} and orderDate=#{orderDate} and setmeal_id =#{setmealId}
select m.name member, s.name setmeal,DATE_FORMAT(o.orderDate,'%Y-%m-%d') orderDate,o.orderType From t_member m, t_order o, t_setmeal s where m.id=o.member_id and o.setmeal_id=s.id and o.id=#{id}
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate =#{date}
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate=#{date} and orderStatus ='已到诊'
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate between #{monday} and #{sunday}
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate >= #{monday} and orderStatus ='已到诊'
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate between #{startDay} and #{endDay}
select count(1) from t_order where orderDate >= #{oneday} and orderStatus ='已到诊'

select s.name,t.setmeal_count,s.remark, t.setmeal_count/t1.total proportion from (select setmeal_id ,count(1) setmeal_count from t_order group by setmeal_id) t , (select count(1) total from t_order) t1 ,t_setmeal s where s.id=t.setmeal_id ORDER BY t.setmeal_count desc limit 0,4
